invalidS3Setting.title: Invalid S3 Setting
invalidS3Setting.description: Please check the S3 settings in the settings page.

invalidAppSetting.title: Invalid App Setting
invalidAppSetting.description: Please check the app settings in the settings page.

fail.title: Failed to load photos
fail.description: Open dev console for more info.

info.title: Privacy Statement
info.description: All data on this site is stored in your local browser and is not uploaded to a server.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The URL of the S3 endpoint. Bucket name is not included.

bucketName.title: Bucket Name
bucketName.description: The name of the S3 bucket.

region.title: Region
region.description: The region of the S3 bucket.

publicUrl.title: Public URL
publicUrl.description: Prefix of URL to access the image.

descriptionExtended.line1: By default, the output URL will be constructed based on `Endpoint/BucketName/PathToImage`.
descriptionExtended.line2: If you have a custom domain pointing to the bucket, or the image file cannot be accessed by endpoint url (e.g. R2), you can specify the custom domain here. It will be constructed into `PublicUrl/PathToImage`.

fail.title: Failed to connect
fail.description: Open dev console for more info.

convert.title: Convert Image Before Upload
convert.description: Convert image before uploading to S3. "none" will not perform the conversion.

compress.title: Compress Image Before Upload
compress.description: Use browser-image-compression to compress image before uploading to S3.

keyTemplate.title: Key (Path) Template
keyTemplate.description: The key (path) template of the uploaded file.
keyTemplate.placeholders: Available placeholders: year, month, day, random, filename, ext. (Should be wrapped with {'{{'} and {'}}'}. )
keyTemplate.warning: Warning: CHANGE IT AT YOUR OWN RISK! If the new key collides with the existing key, the existing file will be overwritten.
keyTemplate.info1: The random placeholder is not completely random. It concatenates the milliseconds from 0 am and a two-digit random number to generate the value. Therefore, it is recommended to use it together with year/month/day.
